statements: SELECT ad_name, impression_count FROM ad_tracking;
SELECT ad_name, click_through_rate FROM ad_tracking WHERE impression_count > 1000;
SELECT ad_name, impression_count, click_through_rate FROM ad_tracking WHERE ad_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM ad_tracking ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT ad_name, impression_count, click_through_rate FROM ad_tracking ORDER BY impression_count ASC, click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, impression_count, click_through_rate FROM ad_tracking;
SELECT ad_name, click_through_rate, impression_count, ad_id FROM ad_tracking WHERE ad_id > 100;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name FROM ad_tracking WHERE impression_count > 500 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT ad_name, impression_count FROM ad_tracking WHERE click_through_rate <= 0.05 ORDER BY ad_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ad_tracking WHERE click_through_rate BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5 ORDER BY impression_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM impressions;
SELECT impression_id, ad_id FROM impressions WHERE impression_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT ad_id, COUNT(*) AS total_impressions FROM impressions GROUP BY ad_id;
SELECT * FROM click_through_rates ORDER BY click_date DESC;
SELECT ad_id, click_date FROM click_through_rates WHERE click_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM impressions WHERE ad_id = 100 ORDER BY impression_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM click_through_rates WHERE click_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-05-31';
SELECT ad_id, impression_date FROM impressions WHERE impression_date > '2021-06-30' ORDER BY ad_id ASC, impression_date DESC;
SELECT ad_id, COUNT(*) AS click_count FROM click_through_rates GROUP BY ad_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT impression_date, click_date FROM impressions i JOIN click_through_rates c ON i.ad_id = c.ad_id WHERE i.impression_date > c.click_date;
SELECT * FROM impressions;
SELECT ad_id, user_id, impression_time FROM impressions;
SELECT device_type, location FROM impressions WHERE ad_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM clicks ORDER BY click_time DESC;
SELECT report_date, impressions, clicks FROM reports WHERE ad_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM impressions WHERE device_type = 'mobile' ORDER BY impression_time DESC;
SELECT impression_id, user_id, device_type FROM impressions WHERE location = 'New York' AND device_type IN ('mobile', 'tablet');
SELECT ad_id, user_id, impression_time FROM impressions JOIN clicks ON impressions.impression_id = clicks.impression_id WHERE clicks.click_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY clicks.click_time ASC;
SELECT report_date, ad_id, impressions, clicks, click_through_rate FROM reports WHERE impressions >= 1000 AND click_through_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM impressions WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM clicks WHERE click_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY click_time DESC LIMIT 1);
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT ad_name, ad_type FROM ads
SELECT username, email, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, ad_budget FROM ads WHERE ad_budget > 500
SELECT id, ad_id, user_id, timestamp FROM impressions ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM impressions WHERE ad_id = 1;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, ad_budget FROM ads ORDER BY ad_budget DESC;
SELECT username, email, age, gender FROM users WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT ad_id, user_id, click_timestamp FROM clicks WHERE click_location = 'New York' ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC;

SELECT impressions.id, ads.ad_name, users.username, clicks.click_location FROM impressions JOIN ads ON impressions.ad_id = ads.id JOIN users ON impressions.user_id = users.id JOIN clicks ON clicks.ad_id = ads.id ORDER BY impressions.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(*) FROM ad_impressions GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT action_type, COUNT(*) FROM user_actions GROUP BY action_type ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 'c239d73e-0c9f-4c74-8292-3f2aa8b5fd77';
SELECT users.username, ad_clicks.click_date FROM users JOIN ad_clicks ON users.user_id = ad_clicks.user_id WHERE ad_clicks.click_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ad_clicks.click_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT ad_campaigns.campaign_name, COUNT(ad_impressions.impression_id) AS total_impressions FROM ad_campaigns LEFT JOIN ad_impressions ON ad_campaigns.campaign_id = ad_impressions.campaign_id GROUP BY ad_campaigns.campaign_name ORDER BY total_impressions DESC;

SELECT ad_campaigns.campaign_id, ad_clicks.user_id, user_actions.action_type FROM ad_campaigns JOIN ad_clicks ON ad_campaigns.campaign_id = ad_clicks.campaign_id JOIN user_actions ON ad_clicks.user_id = user_actions.user_id WHERE user_actions.action_date >= '2022-03-01' ORDER BY ad_clicks.user_id ASC LIMIT 10;
